title: Unexpected Error during patch never goes past 33%
body:
I had this problem a bit ago before I got my computer wiped and updated, outside of chrome the only thing I have tried to install since then is league, and it gets to 33% scanning files etc, the only patch in the release is 0.0.0.64
Please help me.

replies.body: At 33 percent, your patcher is ready to download update files but is being blocked from establishing a connection to the patcher servers.  I suggest going over our [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to strengthen your connection and configure access to the server.  That should get you fixed up!
